title: General library conduct
text: Membership for registered students only; bring ID to transact; strict silence; no food/drinks or mobile use; limited computer use; borrowing limits and overdue fines apply.

title: Borrowing rules & fines
text: User privileges: up to 4 books for 15 days (UG/PG); PhD: 2 books for 30 days; reissue max 2 times; overdue fine INR 5 per book per day; lost/damaged books must be replaced or paid for at current price plus fine.
